title: Faber-Castell DoArt Create with Clay Kit
description:
Inspire nascent sculptors to express themselves without the mess. Kit contains 10 colors of clay, 1 rolling tool, 8 shape cutters, 1 texture plate and 1 push mold in a plastic container. Clay never dries out, is easy to mold and won't stain hands.

Recommended for ages 4 and up.
